panels.description: Shows when and how often data has been added to the nodes. The brighter, the more data has been added at that point in time. (host, user, password, payload)
Shows when and how often events happened. The brighter, the more events happened at that point in time. (session created, login finished, command executed)
Shows how long the nodes have been online (avg, min, max)
panels.title: Time online

panels.description: Shows how much bot time the nodes wasted (avg, min, max)
panels.title: Time wasted

panels.description: Shows how much bot time the nodes wasted per second (avg, min, max)
panels.title: Time wasted / s

panels.description: Shows how many commands the nodes are executing per second (avg, min, max)
panels.title: Commands / s

panels.description: Shows how many times bots tried to login on the nodes (avg, min, max)
panels.title: Logins / s

panels.description: Shows how many sessions are open on the nodes (avg, min, max)
panels.title: Sessions

panels.description: Shows how many goroutines are active on the nodes (avg, min, max)
panels.title: Goroutines

panels.description: Shows how much RAM the nodes use (avg, min, max)
panels.title: RAM

panels.description: Shows the ratio between time wasted and time online. Higher values = better.
panels.title: Time wasted / s

list.description: Allows you to select nodes to show the data for.
list.label: Node
list.name: node

list.description: Allows you to select a different data source for the dashboard
list.label: Data Source
list.name: data
